name: The Endless Sea v1
description:
A sort of endless flight? Fly over the endless seas avoiding moving and floating gears while going through hoops to increase your score. How far can you fly?

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow keys to move

[esc] to exit the game

Death returns you to the main menu

Possible Update?

  • Added animations
  • Change in season over time
  • Night and day cycle
  • Leaderboard. Local or Online?
